name: digest-sequence
title: Restriction Enzyme Digestion
description: Simulate restriction enzyme digestion and predict DNA fragments
content:
Overview

This application simulates restriction enzyme digestion using Biopython's catalyze method and returns the resulting DNA fragments.

Features

  • Supports multiple enzymes
  • Works with circular and linear DNA
  • Reports fragment sizes and positions
  • Lists all cut positions

Parameters

  • DNA Sequence: Sequence to digest
  • Enzymes: Space-separated enzyme names (e.g., EcoRI BamHI)
  • Topology: Specify if linear (default is circular)

Output

Returns a JSON file with fragment sequences, sizes, positions, and digestion information.
command: git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps_clone 2>/dev/null || (cd prod_apps_clone && git pull) && pip install -q biopython biomni && python prod_apps_clone/biomni/molecular_biology/digest_sequence.py "${dnaSequence}" ${enzymes} ${linear} -o "${outputDir}"
